Pet Manager Lundy:
Вы можете взять на прокат страйдера или виверну за небольшую плату:

WyvernStrider
[scripts_services.RideHire:ride 1 30 1000|30sec/1000a] [scripts_services.RideHire:ride 2 30 500|30sec/500a]
[scripts_services.RideHire:ride 1 60 10000|1min/10000a] [scripts_services.RideHire:ride 2 60 5000|1min/5000a]
[scripts_services.RideHire:ride 1 300 1000000|5min/1000000a] [scripts_services.RideHire:ride 2 300 500000|5min/500000a]
[scripts_services.RideHire:ride 1 900 10000000|15min/10000000a] [scripts_services.RideHire:ride 2 900 5000000|15min/5000000a]
